1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Calculation on clock.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.ClockCalc
6  ( clockPos, clockNeg,
7    clockCutDay, clockAddDay, clockAddSec,
8    clockAdd, clockSub, clockTimes,
9    clockRangeBy, clockStep,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Clock         as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts         as D
16
17
18-- ----------------------  Calculation
19
20-- | Convert clock to positive clock.
21clockPos :: O.Map D.Clock
22clockPos = D.clockMap abs abs
23
24-- | Convert clock to negative clock.
25clockNeg :: O.Map D.Clock
26clockNeg = D.clockMap neg neg
27
28neg :: (Ord a, Num a) => a -> a
29neg a | a > 0      = - a
30      | otherwise  = a
31
32-- | Set MJD to zero.
33clockCutDay :: O.Map D.Clock
34clockCutDay = D.clockMap (const 0) id
35
36-- | Add MJD.
37clockAddDay :: D.Days -> O.Map D.Clock
38clockAddDay d = D.clockMap (+ d) id
39
40-- | Add second.
41clockAddSec :: D.Sec -> O.Map D.Clock
42clockAddSec s = D.clockMap id (+ s)
43
44-- | Calculation of clock plus clock.
45clockAdd :: B.BinAb D.Clock
46clockAdd = D.clockMap2 (+) (+)
47
48-- | Calculation of clock minus clock.
49clockSub :: B.BinAb D.Clock
50clockSub = D.clockMap2 (-) (-)
51
52-- | Multiplication of clock.
53clockTimes :: Int -> O.Map D.Clock
54clockTimes m = D.clockMap (* (toInteger m)) (* m)
55
56
57-- ----------------------  Range
58
59-- | Create sequence between two clocks.
60--
61--   >>> clockRangeBy (clockStep 120) (clockFromDhm 0 0 0) (clockFromDhm 0 0 5)
62--   [|00:00:00|, |00:02:00|, |00:04:00|]
63--
64clockRangeBy :: O.Map (D.Days, D.Sec) -> B.RangeBy D.Clock
65clockRangeBy step from to = clocks where
66    from'  =  clockTuple from
67    to'    =  clockTuple to
68    clocks =  map fromClockTuple $ B.rangeBy step from' to'
69
70-- | Create clock step of given second.
71clockStep :: D.Sec -> O.Map (D.Days, D.Sec)
72clockStep sec (d, s) = let (d', s') = (sec + s) `quotRem` D.daySeconds
73                       in (d + toInteger d', s')
74
75clockTuple :: D.Clock -> (D.Days, D.Sec)
76clockTuple (D.ClockDhms d s)  =  (d, s)
77clockTuple (D.ClockDhm  d s)  =  (d, s)
78clockTuple (D.ClockDh   d s)  =  (d, s)
79clockTuple (D.ClockD    d)    =  (d, 0)
80
81fromClockTuple :: (D.Days, D.Sec) -> D.Clock
82fromClockTuple (d, s) = D.ClockDhms d s
